name: BHS Testing - North Adams
info:
If this is your second dose, don't forget to bring your vaccine card.
*Tip: Take a picture of your vaccine card on your phone in case your card gets lost
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Saint Vincent Hospital Vaccine Collaborative @ Worcester State University - Wellness Center
info:
***By appointment only***
Minors under the age of 18 MUST have a signed parental/legal guardian consent when arriving to the clinic
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
